    • Method Detail

      • launchRealAndroidApp

        public static void launchRealAndroidApp(java.lang.String appName)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Launch app based on appName. This will assist to launch multiple app with different appPackage/appActivity capabilities within same test script scope

        Ex:"flipkart". This App name passed will concat with AppPackage/AppActivity string. The resulting string variable value is retrieved from config.properties file & will automatically launch the app/driver session
        Parameters:
        appName - the app name. Ex:"flipkart" or"fk" or anything which is exactly same as variable name in config.properties file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • launchEmulatorAndroidAppViaLocalAPKPath

        public static io.appium.java_client.AppiumDriver launchEmulatorAndroidAppViaLocalAPKPath(java.lang.String localSysApkPath)
                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Launch emulator and installs android app via local system APK path and then launches the App directly.
        Parameters:
        localSysApkPath - the local sys apk path.
        Ex for windows: "D:/Softwares/workspacePersonal/com.flipkart.android-4.2-APK4Fun.com.apk"
        Ex for mac: "/Users/username/Softwares/workspacePersonal/com.flipkart.android-4.2-APK4Fun.com.apk"
        Returns:
        the appium driver
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • launchEmulatorAndroidApp

        public static io.appium.java_client.AppiumDriver launchEmulatorAndroidApp(java.lang.String appName)
                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Launch emulator android app. This will assist to launch multiple app with different appPackage/appActivity capabilities within same test script scope

        Ex:"flipkart". This App name passed will concat with AppPackage/AppActivity string. The resulting string "fkAppPackage/fkAppActivity" variable value is retrieved from config.properties file & will automatically launch the app/driver session
        Parameters:
        appName - the app name. Ex:"flipkart" or"fk" or anything which is exactly same as variable name in config.properties file
        Returns:
        the appium driver
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • launchEmulatorAndroidBrowser

        public static io.appium.java_client.AppiumDriver launchEmulatorAndroidBrowser()
                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Launch emulator android browser.
        Returns:
        the appium driver
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
